member.name: MF_CLOCK_STATE
member.summary: Defines the state of a clock.

member.name: MF_CLOCK_STATE.MFCLOCK_STATE_INVALID
member.summary: The clock is invalid. A clock might be invalid for several reasons. Some clocks return this state before the first start. This state can also occur if the underlying device is lost.

member.name: MF_CLOCK_STATE.MFCLOCK_STATE_RUNNING
member.summary: The clock is running. While the clock is running, the time advances at the clock's frequency and current rate.

member.name: MF_CLOCK_STATE.MFCLOCK_STATE_STOPPED
member.summary: The clock is stopped. While stopped, the clock reports a time of 0.

member.name: MF_CLOCK_STATE.MFCLOCK_STATE_PAUSED
member.summary: The clock is paused. While paused, the clock reports the time it was paused.
